title: Silent Hill 2 playthrough — Part 1
description:
Changes from 16:9 to 4:3 a couple hours through. Looks a bit better I think, and allows chat to be seen, so that's nice.
I got lost for a long time in the apartments, but I eventually made it out. I like this game, but so far I think I like Silent Hill 1 more. That could change though, we'll see!
